Swiss Toniq Pure Cold-Pressed Argan Face Oil

Brand: Swiss Toniq

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil

Directions: Apply a small amount to face and neck, once or twice a day. No need to apply moisturizer.

Warnings: Argan Oil must be used within 6 months of receiving it as our products are alive and activ
book: 1914-Swiss Toniq Pure Cold-Pressed Argan Face Oil
